description: This file defines a React functional component called TopHeader, which serves as a top navigation/header bar for a web application. It includes elements like a menu button, a title, a search input, status indicators, theme toggle, and login/logout controls.

methods.name: onQuickLogin
methods.description: Handles login action by calling login with a default admin email, used for quick access or placeholder login.

methods.name: TopHeader({ title, onOpenSidebar, searchValue, onSearchChange, status = { label: "Network healthy", variant: "primary" } })

ctags.name: TopHeader
ctags.signature: ({ title, onOpenSidebar, searchValue, onSearchChange, status = { label: "Network healthy", variant: "primary" } })
